column1: Smoque BBQ////So me and the BF made the trek from Oak Park to pick up Smoque. Real pain to get there
column4: yes and no. BF got the chopped brisket. A+. I got the full rack of ribs and gotta say
column7: they were not especially meaty. Really? Come on
column8: Smoque! And they are pretty much the priciest thing on the menu
column9: so I expected more. Will be back
column10: someday (it's a long drive) but I think I'll stick to Q in La Grange. Way closer and honestly? Just as good.
